metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010022 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** GNU Libc current is affected by: Mitigation bypass. Theimpact is: Attacker may bypass stack guard protection. The component is:nptl. The attack vector is: Exploit stack buffer overflow vulnerability anduse this bypass vulnerability to bypass stack guard. NOTE: Upstreamcomments indicate "this is being treated as a non-security bug and no realthreat."

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
